greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: T(n, k) = 2^(n-k)*3^k, n >= 1, 0 <= k < n.
program: (PARI) tabl(nrows) = {for (n=1, nrows, for (k=0, n-1, print1(2^(n-k)*3^k, ", ");); print(););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, May 14 2013
xref: Leading diagonal is given by A025192.
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 02 2003
ext: Corrected and extended by _David Wasserman_, Jul 21 2004
